NewsArticle.Title: Gone Fishing
NewsArticle.Content: By popular demand and in appreciation of the recent Peasant Day, fishing is now a standard feature in Dark Ages. It is a tedious hobby but the rewards can be profitable. There are a few types fishes, many more will be added later. You can purchase fishing equipment, somewhere in Temuair. Sometimes you may not even catch a fish, you'll never what's in the mysterious waters. Good luck.
